com.varmateo.yawg.spi.PageVars

      Methods in com.varmateo.yawg.spi that return PageVars 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PageVars PageVarsBuilder.build()
      Creates a new PageVars instance that containing the data currently in this builder.
      static PageVars PageVars.empty()
      Creates an empty PageVars.
      PageVars TemplateDataModel.getPageVars()
      Set of variables available to the page template.
      PageVars PageContext.getPageVars()
      Additional variables made available to the template.
      PageVars DirBakeListener.onDirBake(PageContext context)
      Called when a given directory is being baked during the baking procedure.
      Methods in com.varmateo.yawg.spi with parameters of type PageVars 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PageVarsBuilder PageVarsBuilder.addPageVars(PageVars pageVars)
      Adds to this builder all the variables contained in the given PageVars.
      PageContextBuilder PageContextBuilder.addPageVars(PageVars pageVars)
      Merges the given set of page variables into the set of page variables currently hold by this builder.
      static PageVarsBuilder PageVarsBuilder.create(PageVars pageVars)
      Creates a new builder initialized with the data from the given PageVars.
